mapper.sql: id, shopid, warehouseid, materialid, inbound, outbound, amount, formid, formtype, operate,number, operator, opttime,formoptid
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(r.opttime,'%Y-%m-%d') byday, MAX(w.name) warheousename, MAX(m.sku) sku, MAX(m.name) name, group_concat(r.number) number, SUM(r.quantity) handle from t_erp_inventory_record r LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w ON w.id=r.warehouseid LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=r.materialid WHERE r.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND `status`='outbound' AND formtype='outstockform' AND r.opttime>=#{fromdate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND r.opttime<=#{enddate,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY r.materialid,DATE_FORMAT(r.opttime,'%Y-%m-%d')
